original_title: Renegades: Fragments from a Diary of Three Years' Experience 1970-1973
overview: A fragmented film, largely following street performer George Shevtsov at the 1970 Vietnam Moratorium, the Odyssey Pop Festival at Wallacia in 1971, and street theatre sneezing for lunchtime crowds. The film then takes a darker turn, contrasting audio from a court case with footage of police.
title: Renegades: Fragments from a Diary of Three Years' Experience 1970-1973
